    Function reference

    All functions

    show(<HaplotypeGraph>)
    A HaplotypeGraph Class
    HaplotypeGraph-validity
    HaplotypeGraph validation
    PHGCon-class
    A PHGCon Class
    PHGCon-validity
    PHGCon validation
    show(<PHGDataSet>)
    A PHGDataSet Class
    PHGDataSet()
    PHGDataSet object constructor
    show(<PHGLocalCon>)
    A PHGLocalCon Class
    PHGLocalCon-validity
    PHGLocalCon validation
    PHGLocalCon()
    Helper function to construct a PHGLocalCon object
    show(<PHGServerCon>)
    An PHGServerCon Class
    PHGServerCon-validity
    BrAPI connection validation
    PHGServerCon()
    PHGServerCon object constructor
    brapiURL()
    Return URL path
    brapiVersion()
    Return BrAPI version ID
    buildHaplotypeGraph()
    Helper function to build HaplotypeGraph object
    filterRefRanges()
    Filter data by reference range
    filterSamples()
    Filter data by sample IDs
    hVcfFiles()
    Return hVCF files
    host()
    Return host data
    httProtocol()
    Return protocol value
    initPhg()
    Initialize JVM and add class path (for R&D purposes only)
    javaMemoryAddress()
    Return rJava reference object
    javaRefObj()
    Return rJava reference object
    numberOfChromosomes()
    Return number of chromosomes
    numberOfRefRanges()
    Return number of reference ranges
    numberOfTaxa()
    Return number of taxa
    phgType()
    Return type of PHG connection
    port()
    Return port value
    readHapIdMetaData()
    Return haplotype ID metadata
    readHapIdPosMetaData()
    Return haplotype ID positional metadata
    readHapIds()
    Return haplotype IDs
    readPhgDataSet()
    Return all hVCF data from a JVM graph
    readRefRanges()
    Return reference ranges
    readSamples()
    Return samples IDs
    serverInfo()
    Return server information

    rPHG2 is an R package developed by The Buckler Lab
